title: Brady Quinn on Luck's retirement, Best Bets with Kenny White (Football 8/27)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn for an even further dissection of Andrew Luck's retirement including a detailed look at the physical and mental toll of rehabbing an injury from a former players' perspective. Then, gambling expert Kenny White joins the podcast (31:15) to share his power ratings, top Vegas trends entering 2019, as well as some win total and Week 1 wagers. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
